Answer: An object at rest stays at rest and an object in motion stays in motion with a constant velocity.
Distractor1: The rate of change of momentum of an object is directly proportional to the force applied| and occurs in the direction in which the force is applied.
Distractor2: The acceleration of an object is directly proportional to the force applied to the object.
Distractor3: Every action has an equal and opposite reaction.
